item.description:
Boston Affiliate Marketing Networking group


Agenda:

1:00 to 1:30pm: Intro

1:30 to 2pm:

Open Affiliate Topic Discussion

2 to 2:15pm:

Guest Affiliate Speakers:

Rob Kassner
http://www.hertaste.c...
Hertaste is panel of women who advise men on the topics of style, dating, interior design, and gift suggestions. If it can help a guy make a good impression on women, we rate it. Women do this to raise money for charity and help the fashion clueless improve their sense of style. Click here to read the article on Hertaste featured in The Boston Globe.


Topic: Discuss there affiliate business model and experiences as an affiliate.

2:15 to 2:30pm Q & A

2:30 to 2:45pm Share advice

Whats working to make money online or build a performance based sales channel.

2:45 to 3:00pm Open Challenge Question: How can this group help you?

3:00pm to 3:30pm:Open networking
item.how_to_find_us: sign in at the front desk.
item.why: You'll learn at least 3 good tips to make money online or grow a performance based affiliate sales channel.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Affiliate Marketing Networking Group
